SamplingMethod: 5 secon burtst of dome suction sampler

NumberOfReplicates: 23 sites, 4 30s samples per site per year

SampleArea: 5 times of 10 L of water filtered through Apstein net with 80 mkm sieve

Datasource_name: LTER North Temperate Lakes Benthic Macroinvertebrates

OriginalMetric: mn no per trap per night
